function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about job status and financial condition leading to poor mental health","Impact":"Decreased productivity, poor mental health, lack of purpose","Mitigation":"Regular communication, financial support, mental health resources","Technologies":"Communication tools, mental health apps","People":"Employees","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Health and safety risks of COVID-19 in different work environments","Impact":"Transmission of contagious diseases, risk of infection, potential illness and hospitalization","Mitigation":"Adherence to health and safety measures, regular risk assessments, compliance with regulations","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to safety measures in construction tasks","Impact":"Increased risk of accidents, injuries, and transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Training on safety protocols, strict enforcement of safety rules, regular inspections","Technologies":"Safety monitoring systems, wearable safety devices","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Employers"}]}
